title: PA Rep. Fred Keller, Labor Sec. Scalia, Jobs
itunes:title: PA Rep. Fred Keller, Labor Sec. Scalia, Jobs
description:
Guests: Congressman Fred Keller, a Republican representing the 12th district of Pennsylvania, Robert Shapiro, Chairman of Sonecon and former Senior Economic Advisor for Democratic presidential campaigns including Presidents Bill Clinton and Barack Obama, Former Republican Ohio Congressman Jim Renacci, Mattie Duppler, Founder of Forward Strategies, and Senior Fellow at the National Taxpayers Union.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
